display_long_description:
# BECOME THE AIRPORT SECURITY HERO—STOP CHAOS, CATCH SUSPECTS, AND KEEP THE TERMINAL IN CHECK!

# 🕵️‍♂️ Surprise Inspections
Passengers approach with suspicious items—sometimes harmless, sometimes explosive. Can you react in time?
[media]
# 🛃📝 Passport Patrol
Check every document carefully. Expired IDs, mismatched ages, or odd details won’t escape your watchful eye.
[media]
# 💣🤯 Explosive Situations
Some travelers bring more than just luggage… handle dangerous surprises without losing your cool!
[media]
# 🧳👀 Scan and Spot
X-ray every bag for unusual items. Toothbrushes, rubber ducks, or something far more sinister—nothing gets past you.
[media]
# 🚨👮‍♂️ Call the Authorities
Decide if passengers are cleared or if it’s time to escalate. Your choices shape the day at the airport!
[media]
# ✈️🛂Join our Discord crew
Share your funniest passenger encounters, compete with fellow border officers, and get the latest news, updates, giveaways, and surprises!

👉 liminagames.com/discord
